Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Really terrific skating Thursday morning. As reported, golf course was rolled this morning, and it's gorgeous (90% perfect, the rest is grassy).  Thank you, Metroparks!  From the Metroparks web site: "Bucks Run is currently closed.  Snow is currently being made for Bucks Run and construction will being in the coming weeks. Patrons are free to ski on the trails marked by orange flags on the golf course trails as conditions allow.  The golf course and Cedar Trace trails will be rolled this morning December 4, 2025.  No additional grooming will take place until we receive additional snow."

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob is not yet open for its down hill program : coming this weekend . But the groomers jumped the gun on the Nordic Trails . Access through Valley road to the red and blue loops are currently primo !

nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails will be open this Saturday and Sunday. We are packing the trails every morning to improve conditions. Expect very good conditions this weekend.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob will open this December 6 and 7 for skiing and riding. We anticipate having 12 runs open which includes almost every run on our frontside with the exception of Scarface, Chute and Twilight Zone. We plan to have 3 chairlifts open along with the rope tow. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. See you on Saturday! We will be open daily for skiing and riding beginning on December 12.
